title: Clippers vs. Hornets Tickets Available – Sunday, March 16
description: On Sunday, March 16, 2025, the Los Angeles Clippers (32-28) play the Charlotte Hornets (14-45) at 7 p.m. ET on FDSSC and FDSSE. Looking for NBA tickets? Head to StubHub today and see your team live.
